doc.title: Felix Laughs Last
doc.plot: Felix is having problems with the mice. They steal a sausage from Felix's owner, and he gets blamed for it. Then he tries to help a neighbor with a sack of grain, but the mice cut a hole in the sack and all the grain drains out. Felix plots his revenge, though, planning to lure the mice into a trap by promising them a delivery from the cheese shop.
